data.eml:eml: Apteronotus caudimaculosus n. sp. (Gymnotiformes: Apteronotidae), a sexually dimorphic black ghost knifefish from the Pantanal, Western Brazil, with a note on the monophyly of the A. albifrons species complex.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carlos David de Santana (2003): Apteronotus caudimaculosus n. sp. (Gymnotiformes: Apteronotidae), a sexually dimorphic black ghost knifefish from the Pantanal, Western Brazil, with a note on the monophyly of the A. albifrons species complex. Zootaxa 252: 1-11, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:F8968B32-56CC-4502-B6E3-896FDF06684F
